sentences.sContent: The cut burns from the iodine.
sentences.sCn: 伤口因涂了碘酒而疼痛。

sentences.sContent: Apply some iodine before you bandage.
sentences.sCn: 用绷带包扎伤口之前先敷点碘酒。

sentences.sContent: The tincture of iodine smarted when applied it to the wound.
sentences.sContent_eng: The tincture of iodine smarted when applied it to the wound.
sentences.sCn: 往伤口上擦碘酒时，能引起剧痛。

phrases.pCn: [化]聚维酮碘；[化]聚乙烯吡咯酮碘

trans.tranOther: a dark blue chemical substance that is used on wounds to prevent infection. It is a chemical  element  :symbol I
